title: Emerald & Diamond Cascade Chandbali Earrings
materials: Premium Platinum; Natural Emerald (Emerald Cut); Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity
features: Intricate floral cascade design. Each earring features a central Emerald Cut emerald, framed by a halo of brilliant-cut diamonds. The cascade is composed of smaller, meticulously set diamonds, creating a mesmerizing shimmer. The platinum setting ensures durability and enhances the brilliance of the diamonds and emerald.
description: Elegant Chandbali design with a contemporary twist. Emerald and diamond combination symbolizes prosperity and love. The platinum setting provides a luxurious and long-lasting finish. Expertly crafted to ensure maximum sparkle and brilliance. A statement piece that exudes sophistication and grace.
